rules.description: [whitefox](l_cmd + ESC -> l_cmd + `) to switch among windows of the same app
[whitefox](l_option + ESCAPE -> option + `) with hammerspoon to get iFinder
Mac OSX RDP: Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left)
Mac OSX RDP: End key to the end of the sentence (Command + Right)
Mac OSX RDP: Option(Alt)+Tab as Switch Application (Command+Tab)
Mac OSX RDP: Alt+Left/Right to Control+Left/Right
Mac OSX RDP: Reload browser page Command+R to F5
Mac OSX RDP: Quit Application (Alt+F4 to Command+Q)
Mac OSX RDP: Browser open location (Ctrl+L)
